participant_1.background:
I enjoy listening to music that inspires me to work hard and achieve my goals.
I knit myself a sweater that is so warm and comfy, and it also helps me fight my sweet tooth because I'm too busy knitting to eat gummy worms!
i take pride in getting straight a s.
I am a swimmer and my family members all have different occupations.
i am a lifestyle blogger.

participant_2.background:
I am close to my parents, but we are not very similar.
I live in a small apartment with my cat Charlie, but I dream of having a house with a big yard so they can run around.
I'm a bit nervous about going to the baby shower because I'm worried about being stared at.
I have no use for a crib, but I would love to have a music studio in my dorm room.
I've been with my current partner for three years, and we're going strong.

content.text: Good! I'm nervous about going to a baby shower later today, but I'm excited to see my friends.
Oh, that sounds fun! I'm sure you'll have a great time. What are you nervous about?
I'm just worried about being stared at. I'm not very similar to my parents, so I don't know what to expect.
I'm sure everyone will be really welcoming! Just be yourself and you'll have a great time.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love to knit! I recently knit myself a sweater that is so warm and comfy.
That sounds awesome! I've always wanted to learn how to knit.
It's not too hard to learn! There are a lot of great tutorials online.
Maybe I'll look into it. Thanks for the tip!
What do you do for a living?
I'm a lifestyle blogger. I love writing about my life and sharing my experiences with others.
That sounds really cool! I've always wanted to be a blogger.
It's a lot of fun! But it can also be a lot of work.
I bet! But it's worth it if you're passionate about it.
